Module count
Package count.model

Class Likelihood

java.lang.Object
count.model.Likelihood
All Implemented Interfaces:
GLDParameters
Direct Known Subclasses:
Ancestor
public class Likelihood
extends Object
implements GLDParameters
Algorithms for computing conditional likelihoods bottom-up.
Author:
Miklós Csűrös

      public void setCalculationWidthThresholds​(int absolute, double relative)
      Sets up truncated likelihood calculations: at ancestors, the maximum copy number assumed is given by the minimum between the absolute threshold and the product of the relative threshold times maximum copy number observed.
